name: Dino Dash (mattaridev)
description:
In the sky and out of control, play as an unstoppable dinosaur and navigate the clouds. Defeat everything in your path to get to your goal at the end of the horizon. WARNING: There is a loud unfixable sound (around 4 seconds in) on the title screen caused by WebGL. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.

Tip: Holding space makes it easier to wall jump.
